name: Jane Soraya!
greetingText: Claims herself as a squirrel 🐿️, but I just think she's more look like an otter 🦦.
wishText: Just wanted to say how much I appreciate you. You're an amazing person—fun to be around, easy to talk to, and I’m really glad to have you around. Whatever the future holds, I hope today reminds you how special you are. Hope your day is filled with smiles, love, and comfort Jane. I can’t give you flowers, so here’s a cute cat picture instead. With a little more than friendship, but a lot of care 🤓
